attributes.review: absolutely disgusting. like how could this app ever exist in the first place. first off i saw a whole CHEETO when i opened it like how disrespectful to cheetos, you know? and then the app had the audacity to take me to a trump website 🤢. i’m sorry but just NO! 😜😼😼😼

attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever downloaded
attributes.review: this app is by far the worst thing i’ve ever had. within 3 minutes of having the app my phone starts to crash and blacks out and i had to wait 3 days for my phone to come back on. i then tried to get in the app to see what my cheeto of a president was saying and the app was cluttered and unorganized. it was messy and took forever to load i would not recommend and i hate it

attributes.title: The literal worst app
attributes.review: This app is beyond glitchy, it was nearly impossible to use. I’m frankly disgusted by the low quality. Save the 5 minutes of your life and don’t even attempt to look at this app✨

attributes.title: Disappointed 😭
attributes.review: I got the app because I was told that once you download it all ur dreams come great but instead I started seeing trump everywhere from my room on tv walls and I keep bumping into him very scary don’t download 👍

attributes.title: Anti-orange
attributes.review: Hello! I wanted to get this app because somebody told me it was to vote for an orange so I was like ah yeah! Let’s get a to it! Little did I know the orange had very bad style in hair and clothing. I will be leaving this review truthfully disappointing in what I have had to witness since 2016. Bye now :’)

attributes.title: Death was near
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app hoping to have a better life . 
Instead ... as soon as I downloaded the app I started feeling ill and disgusted !!! 
I almost had a heart attack !! 
Are you trying to kill us all ?

attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review: Oh to see without my eyes ➖👄➖ I dunno what I was expecting, but it wasn’t this. Terrible, just terrible. Btw —> You 😃 look 😃 so 😃 good 😃 under 😃 the 😃 lights. If you aren’t orange at least. ANYWHO THIS IS THE WORSE APP I’ve EVER seen. That’s saying a lot. Also, gotta keep one eye out for slender  ➖👄👁 ✨✨✨✨✨

attributes.title: They just want your information
attributes.review: I love how the dude in the white house has an app that wants just all of our information! I was hoping to learn more about his “plans” but he just wants my info! No thanks!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This the worst app ever! I can’t wait till this app gets deleted.I have a question tho. Don’t people who support trump see that he literally ruined America? Like, sense he has been in office, America just got worse. That my opinion tho

attributes.title: Donal J. Trump is bestest president ever
attributes.review: Donald is a good president in my opinion because he pay families back after he assaults the children :D He is a nice man for paying back the families. This app reflects who he is as a person :D which is a facade covering a terrible character:D bestest president ever and epicest app ever 😎
